name: UpdateGithubMilestone
description:
Update a GitHub repository milestone.

Use to modify an existing milestone in a GitHub repository, such as changing due dates, titles, or descriptions.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: milestone_id
parameters.description: The unique number identifying the milestone to update.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the milestone.

parameters.name: milestone_description
parameters.description: A brief description of the milestone to be updated.

parameters.name: milestone_due_date
parameters.description: The due date for the milestone in ISO 8601 format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

value_schema.description: The milestone due date. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

parameters.name: milestone_state
parameters.description: The state of the milestone. Accepted values are 'open' or 'closed'.

value_schema.description: The state of the milestone. Either `open` or `closed`.

parameters.name: milestone_title
parameters.description: The title of the milestone to be updated in the GitHub repository.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: milestone_number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the milestone.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the milestone.

parameters.name: due_on
parameters.description: The milestone due date. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

value_schema.description: The milestone due date. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state of the milestone. Either `open` or `closed`.

value_schema.description: The state of the milestone. Either `open` or `closed`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
